bomberman.core.logic
Class BrickBlock

java.lang.Object
  bomberman.core.logic.Block
      bomberman.core.logic.BrickBlock
All Implemented Interfaces:
PhysicsEntity
public class BrickBlock
extends Block

The BrickBlock class extends Block. It represents a rigid breakable block of ground. Entity instances cannot pass over it, but Bombs can destroy it. In its inside contains the eventual PowerUp, represented with a static Body.

Author:
Federico Scozzafava

destroy

public Block destroy()
Description copied from class: Block
Destroys the Block. Depending on the block's type, it may return its content, another type of block, or itself.
